snippet: The Cubs’ Jon Lester, who signed a six-year, $155 million deal in the off-season, said the missed start was “nothing to be alarmed about.”
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago Cubs pitcher Jon Lester misses his start against Seattle Mariners with tired arm; other MLB news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILLY WITZ

lead_paragraph: The Cubs’ Jon Lester, who signed a six-year, $155 million deal in the off-season, said the missed start was “nothing to be alarmed about.”

headline.print_headline: Lester Skips His Start to Let Arm Rest Awhile
headline.main: Jon Lester Skips His Start to Let Arm Rest Awhile
